ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 12 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories & Warranty, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon PowerShot SX280 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Image Stabilized Zoom 25mm Wide-Angle Lens, 1080p Full-HD Video, Built-in Wi-Fi and GPS (Black)
32 Gigabyte SD High Capacity Secure Digital Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit
Additional NB-6L Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery - Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Neck Strap & Belt Loop
Full Size 50" Tripod with case - HDMI Cable for High Definition TV connection - Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
